{"id":1231375669,"question_id":3382,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1713025863,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"77 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1231375669/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Number of Subarrays Where Boundary Elements Are Maximum","memory":"60.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long numberOfSubarrays(int[] nums) {\n\n        int len = nums.length;\n\n        Stack<int[] > st = new Stack<>();\n\n\nlong res = 0 ;\n\n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n\n            int val = nums[i];\n\n            while(!st.isEmpty() && st.peek()[0]<val){\n                st.pop();\n            }\n            if (st.isEmpty() || st.peek()[0] != val)\n                st.push(new int[]{val, 0});\n            st.peek()[1]++;\n            res += st.peek()[1];\n        }\n\n        return res;\n\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-number-of-subarrays-where-boundary-elements-are-maximum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
